author: sascharodekamp
msg: * I add a new layer for content object organization. The new layer provides a simpler API to work with the OfbizContentMapping. The new Layer lives in the application area, because it contains application related code instead of the JCR default implementation in the framework which only contains generic code.
* Added and improve the node versioning
